name: The Pumpkin Spice Latte
description:
Hello Guys!

This is my first game for me to upload in public, I hope your comments will help me to improve for next time, you can tell me any bugs or things that I need to improve.

The game is a sort of a puzzle game when you are making a cup of Pumpkin Spice Latte by finding the ingredients. I got the idea from the description of the jam where it says "Fall is coming and I can smell the Pumpkin Spice Lattes". I made 3 levels and a tutorial, every level gets harder and gets more ingredients. Some ingredients will not come directly, for example there are only 5/8 ingredients in the 1 level. I understand that the backround music is repeating.

Ingredients:

  • Milk
  • Cloves
  • Esspresso
  • Nutmeg
  • PumpkinPure
  • Pumpkin Pie Slice
  • Sugar
  • Cinnamon

I made the game with my teacher for coding. He also has his own game in this jam. I hope you'll like this game of mine.

Enjoy the Latte!
